Subject: Re: Eclipse/JUnit plugin tests/Run or Debug mode?

J. B. Rainsberger Sun, 05 Dec 2004 12:41:19 -0500
>> I have a question for anyone who does or has done plug-in
>> development for Eclipse.

>> I have noticed that when I run my plug-in tests in Run mode, I get
>> a JVM crash. I think it's the spawned process for the test
>> workbench. When I run the plug-in tests in Debug mode, all is well.

We run tests in both modes. Some things to look @

0 What error messages are you getting? (Running with

> -consoleLog

  in one's Arguments>Program Arguments is helpful.)

1 What's your JVM? (Err, plural: both workbench and launcher)

2 Are you using the org.junit included with the workbench, or newer?

3 Which workbench version?
